title: View Profile not working.
body:
Clicked the button at the top of the client. Didn't work.
Right-clicked on a friend and selected 'view profile'. Didn't worked.

Only thing that fixed it was re-logging which certainly isn't ideal. This has happened to me 3 times now and the joke is getting very old very quickly.

replies.body: How long have you tried waiting for it? Do you experience any lag while in game?
No lag in game, and it doesn't load full stop. The buttons themselves do not link to anywhere.
What's your current resolution? What mouse-click are you typically using? Could you test your mouse to make sure it's registering all clicks?
